name: Monoi Tahiti Body and Hair Butter
description:
Simply divine. My Monoi de Tahiti butter blend has an exotic floral scent of Tahitian gardenia flowers , coconut oil and coco butter. This butter/ salve will leave your hair and skin smelling naturally sweet and beautiful. (not an over powering scent)

Monoi de Tahiti Oil is reputed to nourish and condition damaged keratin fibres of the hair. I combined a blend of Olive, Avocado, Safflower, Almond oil to make this hair and skin butter a great multitasking moisturizer which can be easily-absorbed. Great for dry skin and dull hair. 

Formulation Benefits

♥ Moisturize hair, body, cuticles, feet and elbows
♥ Beautiful scent (Smells Amazing)
♥ Seal in moisture on hair and body
♥ provides shine to hair
♥ Seal split ends
♥ No Shea Butter 
♥ Light non greasy
♥ Absorbs quickly

name: Therapeutic Bath Salts
description:
Whether you need to relax after a long hard day of work, calm down from a stressful morning, or needing an energizing pick me up.  This soothing bath salts are for you!          

Make it a practice to take a series of healing and restorative baths.   Choose a particular night each week, say Thursday at 9:00 and maintain this rhythm for seven weeks.   Your body will thank you.

Add 1-2 tablespoons of therapeutic salts per bath.

 Key ingredients:

Highly Therapeutic Blend of the following Leaf  Oils

**Rosemary, Basil, Peppermint, Eucalpytus, Geranium, Ravintsara**
Dead Sea Salt, Black Sea Salt, Epsom Salt.


100% Vegan, 100% Natural, No Preservatives
12 oz container

(If you're pregnant or have a medical condition that you need to reduce your sodium intake please consult your doctor before use.)

100% Vegan, 100% Natural, No Preservatives
12 oz container

name: Moisturizing Sugar Body Scrub
description:
IInstantly makes your skin soft, smooth, healthy, glowing and vibrant. This product provides an effective scrub without aggravating the skin, buffing away dead skin cells to leave the body with an incredibly soft feel. Pure cane sugar blended with the finest oils results in an entirely natural and stimulating exfoliant.

Apply the scrub to arms, legs, anywhere you want smooth, hydrated skin. Rinse lightly and pat dry. Apply additional lotion or cream if needed.

Formulation Benefits

♥ Sugar adds moisture unlike salt scrubs that dry out skin
♥ Smells Amazing
♥ Gently removes old dry skin
♥ Improves circulation
♥ Soft, moist, glowing, healthy bright skin

Fresh Slice = 100% essential oils
Lemongrass Brown Sugar = essential oil + fragrance oil
Pomegranate = Fragrance oil

15 ounces

name: Green Lady Mask and Exfoliating Treatment with Green Papaya Enzymes & Parsley
description: For healthy glowing radiant skin. Formulation Benefits ♥Brighter youthful skin ♥Helps clear and shrink large pores ♥Smooth complexion ♥Combats acne and blackheads ♥Dual action physical and enzyme exfoliation for healthy glowing radiant skin ♥Facial cleansing wash, facial mask and exfoliating facial treatment all in one product. Use once a week. Follow with my nourishing Argan oil for a perfect combination https://www.etsy.com/listing/89299161/argan-oil-moroccan-argan-oil This facial scrub is formulated from dry natural herbal ingredients that are ground together. When moistened this scrub will provide double exfoliation. The ground herbs gently cleans and polishes your skin while the powerful green papaya enzyme breaks down and dissolves layers of dead skin providing excellent exfoliation. Parsley is added for its toning and skin brightening benefits. This scrub will also help to nourish the skin by stimulating circulation. This scrub can be moistened with either plain water or a liquid with the properties suited to your skin type. (See List Below) Water = All skin types Oil = All/Dry/Damaged Skin Honey = All skin types Yogurt = All/Dry skin HOW TO USE: To moisten the scrub formula for one treatment, place 1-2 teaspoons of the formula into a small bowl and slowly stir in 1-2 teaspoons of the liquid of your choice until it reaches a thick consistency adding 1 teaspoon at a time to avoid adding too much liquid. Apply the moist scrub formula to the skin, then thoroughly and gently massage with your fingertips for about 30 seconds. Be gentle: rubbing too hard and too long will irritate your skin. If you are using as a mask treatment, allow the mask to thoroughly dry on the skin and then rinse. INGREDIENTS: Green Clay, Kaolin Clay, Ground Oats, Cornmeal, Ground Lavender flowers, Ground Calendula flowers, Ground Fennel seeds, Ground Parsley, Green Papaya Enzyme, Myrtle oil, Lavender oil, Carrot Seed Oil. 2oz container _________________________________________________________________ PLEASE NOTE: ONLY ADD LIQUID TO ONE APPLICATION AT A TIME AS ADDING LIQUID TO THE WHOLE CONTAINER WILL CAUSE THE SCRUB TO SPOIL WITHIN DAYS. Pin It

name: Raspberry Butter Lip Treatment
description: For smooth healthy lips A special combination of protective nourishing and protective oils that will restore moisture, hydrate and heal dry, cracked lips. Flavored with refreshing essential oils such as lemon and spearmint. Raspberry oil is high in natural vitamin e and essential fatty acids containing Omega 3 and Omega 6 linoleic acid. Raspberry offers naturally occurring antioxidants that help protect the lips from environmental elements such as cold weather and UV light. key ingredients: safflower seed oil, beeswax, raspberry seed oil, lemon peel oil, rapeseed oil, shea butter, glycerin, spearmint leaf oil, rosemary leaf extract, sunflower seed oil .25 Ounce glass jar Pin It

name: Maracuja Oil = Vitamin C Facial Oil
description: Maracuja oil is derived from the Amazonian passion flower. This pure maracuja oil is a powerful emollient rich in vitamin C, calcium and phosphorus. The high content of essential fatty acids and light texture makes maracuja oil valuable in treating wrinkles & dry aging skin. Maracuja oil can also be used on hair and scalp to encourage hair growth. Maracuja oil absorbs quickly into skin and hair without a greasy feel. Formulation Benefits ♥ Brightens skin ♥ Loaded with vitamin C ♥ Use 2- 3 drops on face at night as a treatment to reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Maracuja oil improves skin texture as well as adding brightness and glow to the skin. ♥ Use it as a night time facial moisturizer. ♥ Use on hair and scalp to nourish and encourage healthy hair growth. ♥ Boost up your favorite facial and hair care products with vitamins and essential fatty acids by adding a few drops of Maracuja oil to the products you already love. Packaged in a 1 ounce amber glass dropper bottle. Pin It

name: Argan Oil
description: Argan oil is extremely rare and is found only in a small region in Morocco. This 100% pure unadulterated cold pressed nourishing oil can be used to treat wrinkles, aging skin, dry skin, dry hair, dry scalp, dry cracked feet, nails & cuticles. ♥ Rich in natural vitamin E, phenols, carotenes, squalene & Omega 3 essential fatty acids for deep penetrating moisture. ♥ Use as a moisturizing treatment for the face and body. ♥ Use as a treatment for wrinkles and dry aging skin. ♥ Use as a hair and scalp treatment for dry itchy scalp and dry hair. ♥ Use a few drops of Argan oil on your cuticles and nails as a treatment for stronger healthier nails. ♥ Boost up your leave-in conditioners by adding a few drops of Argan Oil to your favorite hair conditioners. ♥ Add Argan oil to your body moisturizers that you already love for extra nourishment. 1 ounce dropper container Ingredients: 100% Pure Cold Pressed Argan Oil Pin It

name: Rhassoul Herbal Shampoo Bar - with Raw Apple Cider Vinegar
description: This shampoo bar is loaded with hair loving herbs and nourishing oils. Specially formulated to clean, nourish and soften without stripping your hair of its natural oils. Your hair will feel clean, soft and look shiny. Each Bar is 4 ounces. BENEFITS OF USING THIS SHAMPOO BAR * Loaded with Organic Patchouli to help stimulate hair follicles and promote hair growth together with a touch of tea tree oil helps to control dandruff. * contains RAW APPLE CIDER VINEGAR which cleanses your hair and scalp and provides a balanced pH to promote hair growth and scalp health. *Loaded with Rhassoul Clay a great conditioning cleanser for the hair, detoxifies and removes impurities from the hair and scalp. *I also added a herbal infusion of the following herbs: Organic Burdock: Maintains and Promotes healthy Scalp, encourages hair growth, Improves Hair Strength, Shine and Body. Comfrey Root: Most well known herb for healing Skin, Offers relief to dry itchy skin. Organic Neem: Repairs Damaged Hair, Restores Sheen, Encourages Hair Growth. Organic Nettle: Antifungal properties, Simulates the Scalp and encourages Hair Growth *Formulated with the following nourishing hair loving oils and butters Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter, Safflower Oil, Shea Butter, Wheat Germ Oil and Castor Oil *Contains Panthenol, a plant derived form of Vitamin B which is a humectant, emollient and moisturizer Pin It

name: Mixed Greens
description:
"Mixed Greens" is a nourishing hair pomade to encourage new hair growth and prevent future hair loss. A potent tincture blend of Horsetail, Nettle and Parsley are the main herbal ingredients together with a potent hair loss prevention blend of Rosemary, Lavender, Cypress, Clary Sage and Juniper Essential Oils. All blended together in a nourishing blend of Almond Oil, Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter, Jojoba Oil, Safflower Oil, and Wheat Germ Oil. Formulation Benefits ♥ Light non greasy formula ♥ No heavy waxy feel ♥ No Shea Butter ♥ Horsetail, Nettle & Parsley helps to strengthen hair and help prevent breakage ♥ Provides shine to hair ♥ Essential Oil Blend stimulates scalp and encourage hair growth Directions: Massage a small amount on the scalp. Pay special attention to any thinning areas. Apply to hair as well to soften, moisturize and nourish dry hair. For best results massage small amount onto your scalp with this butter every night before bed

name: Sweet Milk Detangling Cream Leave in Conditioner
description:
This rich conditioning cream helps to replenish moisture, improves wet combing, imparts shine and reduces frizzy flyaways by replenishing the lipid content on the surface of the hair's cuticle. You can use this conditioning cream as a Detangling Rinse or Leave in Conditioner. 

Formulation Benefits

♥ Detangles hair
♥ Reduces frizz
♥ add and retains moisture to wet hair
♥ Leave in or Rinse out
♥ improves wet combing


Fragrance: light sweet passionfruit & pineapple fragrance

Directions: Massage through clean wet hair. Rinse or leave in conditioner and towel dry.

ALLERGY ALERT:
Contains Citrus Oils
Unscented is available upon request

name: Healthy Scalp Serum - Babassu, Rosehip, Monoi de Tahiti Oil & more..
description:
This is a great massage oil for the scalp. You could also use this oil as a pre-shampoo hot oil treatment. It’s non-greasy but very nourishing. It helps to soothe and conditions the scalp. It’s an unique blend of exquisite oils. This oil blend works great on all hair types. Scalp Massages are vital for beautiful healthy hair and scalp. The flow of blood and lymph that feeds the roots of your hair must be stimulated by regular scalp massages. On dry hair apply 15-20 drops of oil to the scalp and gently massage using circular movements with the pads of your fingertips or with the fleshy part of the palm just above your wrists. For extremely dry hair, add oil to the ends of the hair. Wrap hair in a warm towel for 20 minutes. Wash hair if you desire or you can leave the oil in for added moisture. Ingredients include: Olive Oil - attracts external moisture to the skin, very soothing, great for inflamed skin Coconut Oil - oil for dry, itchy or sensitive skin. It will not clog pores and it absorbs readily into the scalp Babassu Oil - soothing, protective and emollient properties. Penetrates quickly into the hair and does not leave a greasy after feel. Rice Bran Oil- very moisturizing oil, natural anti-oxidant, Acai Pulp Oil- a moisturizing oil derived from the acai berry. When used in cosmetics, it acts as a powerful free radical scavenger and also contains anti-inflammatory properties Grape Seed Oil – light moisturizing non greasy oil, absorbs quickly into the scalp Rosehip Oil – great for brittle, dry, damaged hair, or massaged into dry or flaking areas of the skin or scalp Rosemary Oil- Stimulates hair growth Monoi de Tahiti Oil - Monoi oil is infused oil made from soaking the petals of Tahitian gardenias in coconut oil. Monoi is widely used among French Polynesians as a skin and hair softener. Litsea cubeba oil - Lemon/lemongrass scent, calming and anti- inflammatory properties. Astringent and Antiseptic uses. and more……. Benefits of Scalp Massages -Increases the flow of blood and lymph -Keeps the scalp flexible -Stimulates secretions of the glands -Soothing to the nerves -Promotes relaxation 1 oz bottle with Serum Dropper
Share |

name: Babassu Cream Deep Conditioner
description:
This creamy rich deep conditioner drenches the hair with moisture and nutrients. It contains Organic Babassu Oil from Brazil which penetrates the hair to restore dry and damaged hair. It helps to define curls, softens and detangles hair. This conditioner is excellent for thick, dry, curly ,tangled hair. Your beautiful curls will remain even after the product is completely rinsed out of hair. You must try it...You will love it!! Tested and Approved!! Formulation Benefits ♥ Deeply conditions hair ♥ Detangles hair ♥ defines natural curl pattern ♥ Softens moisturizes dry hair ♥ contains moisturizing proteins that strengthen hair without making your hair hard or crispy Fragrance: Citrus Essential oils Directions: Apply to Wet Hair. Leave in for 10-15 minutes then rinse. Pin It Directions: Apply to Wet Hair. Leave in for 10-15 minutes then rinse. 8 ounce jar Key Ingredients: water, behentrimonium methosulfate, cetearyl alcohol, babassu oil, wheat amino acids, soy amino acids, Yarrow extract, Nettle extract, Sage extract, Lavender extract, keratin, panthenol, wheat germ acid, wheat germ oil, linolenic acid, linoleic acid, sulfur, jojoba oil, vitamin E, Citrus essential oils

name: Shea Mint Moisturizing Shampoo - SLS Free
description:
Luxurious and thick. This shampoo provides outstanding nourishment to hair. Rich organic shea butter from Uguanda moisturizes dry hair. This pure high quality shea butter is organically grown and absorbs quickly into the scalp. Burdock, Peppermint and ivy target the scalp and are effective against dandruff. Fenugreek stimulates the hair follicle and hydrolyzed rice protein coats the hair shaft, strengthening the hair fiber. Panthenol penetrates the hair, strengthening the hair from within. This shampoo is SLS and Paraben free and has a very soft low lather that will not strip your hair of its natural oils. It rinses clean and doesn't leave a film or lint build up on hair. This is very important for those who have locked hair styles. This shampoo can be used on all hair types ( straight, curly, locs etc..) Light Peppermint scent from essential oil. ***This shampoo is very thick and unlike any shampoo you've used before! ♥Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS ) Free ♥Paraben Free ♥Propylene Glycol Free ♥Free of Artificial Colors ♥Phthalates Free ♥PH 7

name: Herbal Rich Scalp and Hair Butter
description:
This hair and scalp butter is light and non greasy and chock full of herbs, nut butters and oils to nourish, lubricate and moisturize your scalp and hair Absorbs quickly and easily without a heavy greasy feel. A little goes a long way. Use a small amount at a time. Formulation Benefits ♥ Very soothing if you have dry itchy flaky scalp ♥ Provides Shine ♥ Herbal Infusion helps strengthen hair and prevent breakage ♥ Seals in moisture and binds split ends ♥ Essential oils stimulates scalp to help encourage hair growth Contains infused olive oil consisting of the following Organic herbs: Burdock, Comfrey root, Neem, Chamomile, Nettle, Black Walnut Hull, Marshmallow root, Calendula Flowers, including Geranium, Sage, Peppermint and Lavender essential oil. I also added: Unrefined Raw Shea Butter, Organic Unrefined Cocoa Butter, First Cold Press Food Grade Olive Oil, Safflower Oil, Coconut Oil, Honey Bees Wax. 100% Premium Natural Ingredients No Preservatives

name: Blemish Minimizing Serum
description:
An effective serum that helps stabilize the skin. A concentrate of aloe vera and essential oils helps calm the skin and build its natural immune system. The essential oils work in cooperation with the other ingredients to bring the skin into balance and minimize or eliminate break-outs. Directions: Apply twice daily after cleansing. Shake product and apply as a toner to the skin with clean fingertips or cotton swab. Avoid eye area and other areas of skin susceptible to dryness. Key Ingredients: Aloe vera leaf juice, Zinc, Bilberry Extract, Orange peel extract, Lemon peel extract, Gotu Kola, Tea Tree oil, Lavender oil, Vitamin E, Vitamin A, Vitamin C. 1 ounce treatment with serum pump packaging ALLERGY ALERT: Contains Citrus Oils

name: Herbal Hair Tea Rinse
description:
4" X 5" Large Tea Bag of Organic Herbs External Use Only - Not for Drinking Sold in sets of 2 Hair Tea Rinses are Conditioning Treatments that strengthen the hair and encourages healthy growth of hair as well as give nourishment to scalp hair follicles. ♥ Organic Burdock: Maintains and Promotes healthy Scalp, encourages hair growth, Improves Hair Strength, Shine and Body. ♥Organic Comfrey Root: Most well known herb for healing Skin, Offers relief to dry itchy skin. ♥Organic Neem: Repairs Damaged Hair, Restores Sheen, Encourages Hair Growth. ♥Organic Chamomile: Heals inflamed skin ♥Organic Nettle: Antifungal properties, Simulates the Scalp and encourages hair growth ♥Organic Black Walnut Hull: Antibacterial, Antiviral, Antiparasitic ♥Organic Calendula Flowers: Nourish the skin, healing and Antifungal ♥Organic Marshmallow Root: relieves scalp irritations, provides moisture and slip which helps detangle hair. ♥Lemongrass & Rosemary Essential Oil - Stimulates hair growth ♥ Freshly dried organic herbs. Each tea bag is indiviually wrapped for freshness. Ingredients: Organic Herbs of Nettle, Burdock Root, Neem, Comfrey Root, Chamomile Flowers, Marshmallow Root, Calendula Flowers, Black Walnut Hulls, and Rosemary Essential Oil. Directions: add a tea bag to a large pyrex glass cup or bowl and fill with boiling water and cover. Steep for about 30 minutes. When the tea is warm, apply to scalp and hair and massage thoroughly, When pouring tea onto hair and scalp, hold a bowl at the end of hair strands to catch the tea and reapply. Repeat several times. Leave In or Rinse out if desired. I like to leave in my tea rinses. If you use a conditioner, use this tea rinse after you condition your hair.

name: Shea Butter Body Oil
description:
A mix of Shea butter and food grade Safflower oil provide nourishment and shine to dry skin. Extracts of Aloe, Calendula, Irish Moss, Sunflower, & Marshmallow root will soothe, condition as well as moisturize your skin. This oil would work great as a massage oil as well. Give yourself a neck massage, or massage tired feet at the end of the day to relieve stress and tension. Use after a shower or bath to seal in moisture. You can also add a few drops of oil into a warm bath. Formulation Benefits ♥ Beautiful uplifting scent (Smells Amazing) ♥ Keeps skin moist all day ♥ Seals in moisture after shower or bath ♥ Moisturize body, hair, cuticles, elbows and feet ♥ Add a few drops to bath for moisturizing bath ♥ Warm oil and use as massage oil ♥ Absorbs quickly into skin ♥ Non greasy formula ♥ Adds shine to skin 8 oz bottle Ingredients: Safflower Oil, Shea butter, Aloe, Calendula, Irish Moss, Sunflower, & Marshmallow root extracts, Vitamin E. 8 oz bottle Ingredients: Shea butter, Safflower Oil, Sesame Oil, Aloe, Calendula, Irish Moss, Sunflower, & Marshmallow root extracts, Vitamin E.

name: Botanical Cream Cleanser
description:
Cleansing the skin properly is the foundation of a good skincare regime. Removing surface impurities such as pollutants, make-up, bacteria and excess oil as well as exfoliating the skin to remove dead surface cells without disturbing the delicate moisture and oil balance is one of the keys to beautiful skin. This cream cleanser has been formulated with almond oil, emulsified with naturally- derived vegetable waxes and boosted with certified organic Bulgarian rosewater. The essential oils stimulate circulation and help facilitate the absorption of minerals. The lightness of the emulsion makes it easily rinsed yet effective enough to dissolve and carry away surface impurities including makeup residue. It is gentle enough to remove eye make-up and leaves the skin feeling completely cleansed without feeling stripped. Key Ingredients: sweet almond oil, glycerin, rose flower potassium aspartate, magnesium aspartate, zinc gluconate, copper gluconate, chamomile flower oil, ylang ylang flower oil, lavender flower oil, rose flower oil, rosewood wood oil, rosemary leaf extract, Japanese honeysuckle extract. 2 ounces
Share |
Pin It

name: Hibiscus Nectar Shampoo - SLS Free
description:
Hibiscus sabdariffa is a member of the family Malvaceae and is believed to have originated in West Africa. The Hibiscus sabdariffa variety is grown mainly on the sand dunes of Western Sudan. In India, hibiscus infusions are traditionally used as rinsing agents to improve hair sheen. In Ayurvedic medicine, hibiscus petals was used to stimulate thicker hair growth and to prevent premature graying, hair loss and scalp disorders. This is a Low-Suds Shampoo and won't strip your hair and scalp of its natural and necessary oils. Your hair will feel clean with great luster and shine. I recommend using this shampoo with the detangling sweet milk cream conditioner. ***This shampoo is very thick and unlike any shampoo you've used before! Fragrance: Light Passionfriut & Pineapple Scent ♥Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS ) Free ♥Paraben Free ♥ Propylene Glycol Free ♥Free of Artificial Colors ♥Phthalates Free ♥PH 7 9 oz by weight ALLERGY ALERT: Contains Citrus Oils Unscented is available upon request

name: Herbal Rich Hair Oil
description:
I put together an extensive group of herbs to create this nourshing oil. This oil in loaded with all the ingredients necessary for healthy hair growth and a healthy scalp. ♥ This oil is very light and absorbs immediately without leaving your hair heavy, greasy and weighed down. DIRECTIONS: Massage oil into scalp and hair as needed. You can use this oil as a hot oil treatment. Just put some of the oil in a heat proof container and place it in a hot water bath until the oil is very warm. Massage warm oil into the scalp and brush it through the hair. For thick hair use 1-2 teaspoons or more of oil, For thinner or shorter hair use 1/4-1/2 teaspoon or more. Wrap hair with shower cap for 30min or more, then wash hair. It's not absolutely necessary to wash out the oil....you could leave it in if you wanted to. My infused oil contains the following Organic Herbs: ♥Organic Burdock: Maintains and Promotes healthy Scalp, encourages hair growth, Improves Hair Strength, Shine and Body. ♥Comfrey Root: Most well known herb for healing Skin, Offers relief to dry itchy skin. ♥Organic Neem: Repairs Damaged Hair, Restores Sheen, Encourages Hair Growth. ♥Organic Chamomile: Heals inflamed Skin ♥Organic Nettle: Antifungal properties, Simulates the Scalp and encourages Hair Growth ♥Organic Black Walnut Hull: Antibacterial, Antiviral, Antiparasitic ♥Organic Calendula Flowers: Nourish the skin, healing and Antifungal ♥Marshmallow Root: Adds Moisture and Conditioning properties I also added Sweet Almond oil, Geranium Oil, Sage Oil, Peppermint Oil, Lavender Oil *Please Note: The color of the oil may vary from batch to batch

name: Fresh Face Cream Moisturizer with Pomegranate
description:
A light non oily moisturizer packed with hydrating and moisturizing ingredients. Safflower oil, pomegranate, and evening primrose provide nourishment to thirsty skin. A powerful complex of oat protein, essential minerals and B vitamins soothe dry inflamed skin and replenish devitalized cells. This moisturizer absorbs immediately into the skin and leaves a nice smooth surface for applying makeup. A little goes along way. Conveniently packaged in 2 ounce treatment pump bottles. After cleansing the skin, pat dry and apply cream to the face, and neck. Great for all skin types!! Will not clog pores!! Pin It
